violence.arabic: وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوهُمْ وَأَخْرِجُوهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ أَخْرَجُوكُمْ
violence.transliteration: Waqtuloohum haythu thaqiftumoohum waakhrijoohum min haythu akhrajookum
violence.english: And kill them wherever you find them and expel them from wherever they have expelled you

violence.arabic: وَقَاتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌ وَيَكُونَ الدِّينُ لِلَّهِ
violence.transliteration: Waqatiloohum hatta la takoona fitnatun wayakoona alddeenu lillahi
violence.english: And fight them until there is no fitnah and the religion is for Allah

violence.arabic: كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِتَالُ وَهُوَ كُرْهٌ لَّكُمْ
violence.transliteration: Kutiba AAalaykumu alqitalu wahuwa kurhun lakum
violence.english: Fighting has been enjoined upon you while it is hateful to you

violence.arabic: سَنُلْقِي فِي قُلُوبِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا الرُّعْبَ بِمَا أَشْرَكُوا بِاللَّهِ
violence.transliteration: Sanulqee fee quloobi allatheena kafaroo alrruAAba bima ashrakoo biAllahi
violence.english: We will cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieve

violence.arabic: فَلْيُقَاتِلْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ الَّذِينَ يَشْرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا بِالْآخِرَةِ
violence.transliteration: Falyuqatil fee sabeeli Allahi allatheena yashroona alhayata alddunya bialakhirati
violence.english: So let those fight in the cause of Allah who sell the life of this world for the Hereafter

violence.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا فَخُذُوهُمْ وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ
violence.transliteration: Fain tawallaw fakhuthoohum waoqtuloohum haythu wajadtumoohum
violence.english: If they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them

violence.arabic: إِنَّمَا جَزَاءُ الَّذِينَ يُحَارِبُونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَيَسْعَوْنَ فِي الْأَرْضِ فَسَادًا أَن يُقَتَّلُوا أَوْ يُصَلَّبُوا أَوْ تُقَطَّعَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَرْجُلُهُم مِّنْ خِلَافٍ
violence.transliteration: Innama jazao allatheena yuhariboona Allaha warasoolahu wayasAAawna fee alardi fasadan an yuqattaloo aw yusallaboo aw tuqattaAAa aydeehim waarjuluhum min khilafin
violence.english: The punishment of those who wage war against Allah and His Messenger is that they be killed or crucified or their hands and feet be cut off from opposite sides

violence.arabic: فَاضْرِبُوا فَوْقَ الْأَعْنَاقِ وَاضْرِبُوا مِنْهُمْ كُلَّ بَنَانٍ
violence.transliteration: Faidriboo fawqa alaAAnaqi waidriboo minhum kulla bananin
violence.english: Strike upon the necks and strike from them every fingertip

violence.arabic: وَقَاتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌ وَيَكُونَ الدِّينُ كُلُّهُ لِلَّهِ
violence.transliteration: Waqatiloohum hatta la takoona fitnatun wayakoona alddeenu kulluhu lillahi
violence.english: And fight them until there is no fitnah and the religion, all of it, is for Allah
violence.topic: Fight Until All Religion is Islam

violence.arabic: وَأَعِدُّوا لَهُم مَّا اسْتَطَعْتُم مِّن قُوَّةٍ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ الْخَيْلِ تُرْهِبُونَ بِهِ عَدُوَّ اللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمْ
violence.transliteration: WaaAAiddoo lahum ma istataAAtum min quwwatin wamin ribati alkhayli turhiboona bihi AAaduwwa Allahi waAAaduwwakum
violence.english: Prepare against them whatever you are able of power and steeds of war by which you may terrify the enemy of Allah and your enemy

violence.arabic: فَإِذَا انسَلَخَ الْأَشْهُرُ الْحُرُمُ فَاقْتُلُوا الْمُشْرِكِينَ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ وَخُذُوهُمْ وَاحْصُرُوهُمْ وَاقْعُدُوا لَهُمْ كُلَّ مَرْصَدٍ
violence.transliteration: Faitha insalakha alashhuru alhurumu faoqtuloo almushrikeena haythu wajadtumoohum wakhuthoohum waohsuroohum waoquAAudoo lahum kulla marsadin
violence.english: When the sacred months have passed, then kill the polytheists wherever you find them and capture them and besiege them and sit in wait for them at every place of ambush
Fight them; Allah will punish them by your hands

violence.arabic: قَاتِلُوا الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَلَا بِالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ الْحَقِّ مِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ حَتَّىٰ يُعْطُوا الْجِزْيَةَ عَن يَدٍ وَهُمْ صَاغِرُونَ
violence.transliteration: Qatiloo allatheena la yuminoona biAllahi wala bialyawmi alakhiri wala yuharrimoona ma harrama Allahu warasooluhu wala yadeenoona deena alhaqqi mina allatheena ootoo alkitaba hatta yuAAtoo aljizyata AAan yadin wahum saghiroona
violence.english: Fight those who do not believe in Allah or in the Last Day and who do not consider unlawful what Allah and His Messenger have made unlawful and who do not adopt the religion of truth from those who were given the Scripture - until they pay the jizyah with willing submission, and feel themselves subdued

violence.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ اشْتَرَىٰ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَمْوَالَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ الْجَنَّةَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَيَقْتُلُونَ وَيُقْتَلُونَ
violence.transliteration: Inna Allaha ishtara mina almumineena anfusahum waamwalahum bianna lahumu aljannata yuqatiloona fee sabeeli Allahi fayaqtuloona wayuqtaloona
violence.english: Indeed, Allah has purchased from the believers their lives and their properties in exchange for Paradise. They fight in the cause of Allah, so they kill and are killed

violence.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قَاتِلُوا الَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ الْكُفَّارِ وَلْيَجِدُوا فِيكُمْ غِلْظَةً
violence.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo qatiloo allatheena yaloonakum mina alkuffari walyajidoo feekum ghilthatan
violence.english: O you who believe, fight those of the disbelievers who are near to you and let them find harshness in you

violence.arabic: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَضَرْبَ الرِّقَابِ
violence.transliteration: Faitha laqeetumu allatheena kafaroo fadarba alrriqabi
violence.english: So when you meet those who disbelieve, strike necks

violence.arabic: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ اللَّهِ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ
violence.transliteration: Muhammadun rasoolu Allahi waallatheena maAAahu ashiddao AAala alkuffari ruhamao baynahum
violence.english: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are severe against disbelievers, merciful among themselves

women.arabic: نِسَاؤُكُمْ حَرْثٌ لَّكُمْ فَأْتُوا حَرْثَكُمْ أَنَّىٰ شِئْتُمْ
women.transliteration: Nisaokum harthun lakum fatoo harthakum anna shitum
women.english: Your wives are a place of sowing of seed for you, so come to your place of cultivation however you wish
And men have a degree over them

women.arabic: فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ
women.transliteration: Fain lam yakoona rajulayni farajulun waimraatani
women.english: If there are not two men, then a man and two women

women.arabic: فَانكِحُوا مَا طَابَ لَكُم مِّنَ النِّسَاءِ مَثْنَىٰ وَثُلَاثَ وَرُبَاعَ
women.transliteration: Fainkihoo ma taba lakum mina alnnisai mathna wathalatha warubaAAa
women.english: Then marry those that please you of women, two or three or four
The male shall have the equivalent of the portion of two females

women.arabic: وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُكُمْ
women.transliteration: Waalmuhsanatu mina alnnisai illa ma malakat aymanukum
women.english: And married women except those your right hands possess

women.arabic: الرِّجَالُ قَوَّامُونَ عَلَى النِّسَاءِ بِمَا فَضَّلَ اللَّهُ بَعْضَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ... وَاضْرِبُوهُنَّ
women.transliteration: Alrrijalu qawwamoona AAala alnnisai bima faddala Allahu baAAdahum AAala baAAdin ... waidriboohunna
women.english: Men are in charge of women by what Allah has given one over the other... and strike them

women.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِنَّا أَحْلَلْنَا لَكَ أَزْوَاجَكَ اللَّاتِي آتَيْتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتْ يَمِينُكَ
women.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnabiyyu inna ahlalna laka azwajaka allatee atayta ojoorahunna wama malakat yameenuka
women.english: O Prophet, indeed We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses

women.arabic: وَإِذَا سَأَلْتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَاعًا فَاسْأَلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَاءِ حِجَابٍ
women.transliteration: Waitha saaltumoohuunna mataAAan faisaloohunna min warai hijabin
women.english: And when you ask his wives for something, ask them from behind a partition

women.arabic: وَاللَّائِي يَئِسْنَ مِنَ الْمَحِيضِ مِن نِّسَائِكُمْ إِنِ ارْتَبْتُمْ فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلَاثَةُ أَشْهُرٍ وَاللَّائِي لَمْ يَحِضْنَ
women.transliteration: Waallaee yaisna mina almaheedi min nisaikum ini irtabtum faAAiddatuhunna thalathatu ashhurin waallaee lam yahidna
women.english: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and also for those who have not yet menstruated

apostasy.arabic: وَمَن يَرْتَدِدْ مِنكُمْ عَن دِينِهِ فَيَمُتْ وَهُوَ كَافِرٌ فَأُولَٰئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَالُهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
apostasy.transliteration: Waman yartadid minkum AAan deenihi fayamut wahuwa kafirun faolaika habitat aAAmaluhum fee alddunya waalakhirati
apostasy.english: And whoever of you reverts from his religion and dies while he is a disbeliever - for those, their deeds have become worthless in this world and the Hereafter

apostasy.arabic: كَيْفَ يَهْدِي اللَّهُ قَوْمًا كَفَرُوا بَعْدَ إِيمَانِهِمْ
apostasy.transliteration: Kayfa yahdee Allahu qawman kafaroo baAAda eemanihim
apostasy.english: How shall Allah guide a people who disbelieved after their belief

apostasy.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا فَخُذُوهُمْ وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ
apostasy.transliteration: Fain tawallaw fakhuthoohum waoqtuloohum haythu wajadtumoohum
apostasy.english: If they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them

apostasy.arabic: مَن كَفَرَ بِاللَّهِ مِن بَعْدِ إِيمَانِهِ ... فَعَلَيْهِمْ غَضَبٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
apostasy.transliteration: Man kafara biAllahi min baAAdi eemanihi ... faAAalayhim ghadabun mina Allahi walahum AAathabun AAatheemun
apostasy.english: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after belief... upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment

slavery.arabic: وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُكُمْ
slavery.transliteration: Waalmuhsanatu mina alnnisai illa ma malakat aymanukum
slavery.english: And married women except those your right hands possess

slavery.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ
slavery.transliteration: Waallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoona illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum
slavery.english: And those who guard their private parts except from their wives or those their right hands possess

slavery.arabic: وَمَا مَلَكَتْ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّا أَفَاءَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْكَ
slavery.transliteration: Wama malakat yameenuka mimma afaa Allahu AAalayka
slavery.english: Those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you

slavery.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ
slavery.transliteration: Waallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoona illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum
slavery.english: And those who guard their private parts except from their wives or those their right hands possess

unbelievers.arabic: لَّا يَتَّخِذِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الْكَافِرِينَ أَوْلِيَاءَ مِن دُونِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
unbelievers.transliteration: La yattakhithi almuminoona alkafireena awliyaa min dooni almumineena
unbelievers.english: Let not believers take disbelievers as allies rather than believers

unbelievers.arabic: وَمَن يَبْتَغِ غَيْرَ الْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا فَلَن يُقْبَلَ مِنْهُ وَهُوَ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
unbelievers.transliteration: Waman yabtaghi ghayra alislami deenan falan yuqbala minhu wahuwa fee alakhirati mina alkhasireena
unbelievers.english: Whoever desires other than Islam as religion - never will it be accepted from him, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers

unbelievers.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَتَّخِذُوا الْيَهُودَ وَالنَّصَارَىٰ أَوْلِيَاءَ
unbelievers.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tattakhithoo alyahooda waalnnasara awliyaa
unbelievers.english: O you who believe, do not take the Jews and the Christians as allies

unbelievers.arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ الدَّوَابِّ عِندَ اللَّهِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
unbelievers.transliteration: Inna sharra alddawabbi AAinda Allahi allatheena kafaroo fahum la yuminoona
unbelievers.english: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are those who have disbelieved

unbelievers.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
unbelievers.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi waalmushrikeena fee nari jahannama khalideena feeha olaika hum sharru albariyyati
unbelievers.english: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures

scientific_errors.arabic: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغْرِبَ الشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغْرُبُ فِي عَيْنٍ حَمِئَةٍ
scientific_errors.transliteration: Hatta itha balagha maghriba alshshamsi wajadaha taghrubu fee AAaynin hamiatin
scientific_errors.english: Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it setting in a spring of dark mud

scientific_errors.arabic: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِمَصَابِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَاهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَاطِينِ
scientific_errors.transliteration: Walaqad zayyanna alssamaa alddunya bimasabeeha wajaAAalnaha rujooman lilshshayateeni
scientific_errors.english: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made them as missiles to stone the devils

scientific_errors.arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
scientific_errors.transliteration: Falyanthuri alinsanu mimma khuliqa khuliqa min main dafiqin yakhruju min bayni alssulbi waalttaraibi
scientific_errors.english: Let man observe from what he was created. He was created from a fluid, ejected, emerging from between the backbone and the ribs
And We made the sky a protected ceiling

scientific_errors.arabic: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ... وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
scientific_errors.transliteration: Waalshshamsu tajree limustaqarrin laha... Waalqamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta AAada kaalAAurjooni alqadeemi La alshshamsu yanbaghee laha an tudrika alqamara wala allaylu sabiqu alnnahari wakullun fee falakin yasbahoona
scientific_errors.english: And the sun runs on to a fixed resting place... And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns like the old date stalk. It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each swims in an orbit
